member.name: M:Dapper.OData.Infrastructure.IDbConnection.GetQueryableResult``1(System.String,System.Boolean@,System.Object,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: This action will return those rows which will be fetched by the OData Endpoint
member.param: Command To Fetch Data (Should only be query/text type)
flag to check whether record is present for a certain query
parameters to pass into the query
Filter to be applied on to the data into the database
Number of top rows selected
Skip the number of rows (Mostly used to get nth rows)
Number of rows taken after nth skip (Should be used with skip)
Orders the data
